Hm I havent updated in a little while. I guess there hasnt been too much to say because my life is pretty boring. I went out to the Hamptons with my mom and sister on Saturday. We had to stay with my grandma while my grandpa went bak into brooklyn for a few days because my grandma needs help getting around the house. So I was mucho boredo especially since Joe (my cousin) was super annoying. But he went home on Monday and I invited Colleen out. There was some drama Monday and Tuesday which I wont put up because it would take a long time. To sum it up, a guy got me really pissed and now I refuse to talk to him because he is a jerk. Humph..anyway, now I'm home. Today me and Shanell were supposed to go to Serenas house to study for the math test tomorrow, but Serena had to cancel last minute :(  So now I'm stuck studying alone and doing last minute shopping for my trip. 
 Speaking of trip..AHHH!! I CANT WAIT!!! I found out yesterday that elena is still gonna be in Dallas Saturday so she's gonna hang out with me and Sam. Then Sunday  night I fly to Austin!!! Rachel is worried that I'm not gonna have a good time, psh rach if you are reading this, dont worry!!! I'm so happy to just be leaving this house and this family that I would love just hanging out. But dont worry we are gonna have a lot of fun. 
 AH! sorry theres like, large amounts of thunder outside and my dog just like freaked out. he ran into the kitchen and practically gave himself a concussion on the refrigerator. tehe..Ok tomorrow I got the math test in the morning, then I'm goin out to lunch with Shanell, and then I'm hanging out with Kenzi and Nicole. We are having a Guys Hunt because most guys we know suck. :)Then on Friday I'm doin all this last minute stuff. Packing, gettin my nails done, doind my hair, etc. 

Okay i gotta go shower and stuff. Might not write for awhile now. I'm kinda gettin bored of LJ. adios

I cant remember that much so yesterday I went to Kenzis house with nicole and we layed in the pool and tanned with the yummy tanning oil (kenzis kinky playtoy). oh we also had made bubble blowing skills :) then i left early to shower, and drive to natalees house. she had a few ppl over for a bbq and me and christina slept over. i loooovee her house sooo freakin much!!! and her sisters are the best!! anyway we watched laws of attraction and when harry met sally. this morning we ate breakfast out on the patio (overlookin the water mind you). then we went kayaking, swimming in the bay, dug up clams, swam in the public pool, and did yoga!! yeah it was crazy cool. so then i went straight from there to graces house!! i took a super fast shower there and her mom drove us to brians. me, grace, brian and some guy named nick went out on brians boat which was fun bc we all jumped into the water and laughed and stuff. then the guys got "frisky" and were throwing me and grace overboard which we kinda didnt like b/c the water was deep and dark :(

Hey!! Wow super amazing time last night!! Before anyone starts reading, if you dont wanna hear about my night (for some strange reason) you should stop now because this entry is mainly about that. 
 Anyway so Lisas mom picked me up at four something and we got there a little after 5. the only other person there was matt (go figure--dont wanna know what they were up to cough cough ;) So we sat out on trish's deck with music, food all that stuff. more ppl came and we kinda just mingled and ate for awhile. ppl spread out along the sand, deck, inside *wink* I mostly stayed with Trish, Matt, Liz, Aaron, Eric, Danny, Emily, Tyler, and Sam. Sometimes ppl walked away, sometimes I went away, but ya get the pic. Okay so we eat dinner, dance, and then some of us go out onto trish's "baby" aka her boat. It was super fun and Liz was like, OMG IM FALLING!! haha yeah a liilll paranoid. Then we saw ppl jumping into the water so we were like, o what the hell. so we all went in and were like, LIZ JUMP!! and shes like, ARE THERE ANIMALS IN THERE?!?! SHARKS?! Okay so all in all it was a very fun night and I dont wanna go into too many details because that would be boring and long. Toward the end ppl had left so me Trish and Emily layed on the sand and just talked. Talked about the most random things but I think it was one of the best parts of the night. Dont wanna get all sappy on ya so I'll stop there. I can also get sappy in another topic *wink* but I'll refrain on account of Aaron saying I'm gonna make him sick. All I'll say is that i know You are reading this and i had a great time just being ourselves. You're so awesome and i dont know how i got so lucky. 
 Okay so I got home around 1;30, went to bed, and got up at 7. Went to school, took the ES regent (not too bad, i didnt fail) and then i went lookin for grace. Took me awhile but we got to her moms car, picked up her bro and his gf, and chilled at her house for about an hour. there was a bit of drama with some guy named joe--but w/e its okay now. so then we picked up her friend brian, who had gone to St Ants, but left before i got there. he was sooo nice tho!! we went to this pizza place in the mall (why are all these ppl staring at us?) then we walked to this cosmetics store and tried on all these gross perfumes :x then we went to the candy shoppe (Ill take ya to the candy shop..) and grace and i got GUM!! oo the sugar....then we got bored so we went to blockbuster and rented boogeyman and the shining..whoa i was so freaked! we watched them in a dark room and then it started thundering!! then we played mario car racing thing and grace kicked ass!!! but then brian was sweet and distracted her so i could win :) thnx brian!!! 
 so now im home *sigh* and i got no more tests or anything *double sigh* i am happy, dont get me wrong, it just feels like this year went soo fast so im worried about the next three years. ANNNYWHOOO its summer so im very excited to party it up and be with friends outside of school. not to mention my tx trip!! ive missed sam and rachel so much so im totally ready to get OUUTA HERE!!!

 ok well im gonna go do some exercise (i feel sooo fat right now!!) and then heat up some leftover macaroni :/
x0x0

I know I just updated yesterday but today was my last day of school and im more upset than i thought i'd be. Plus I've been studying like crazy today so I needed a break. 

Math-Went thru the homework quick and then just hung out in class. serena and i took pix and talked with joe (who isnt coming back next year. actually A LOT of ppl arent coming back, luckily not too many ppl im friends with).
Spanish-finished our listening comp. test and then played bingo. i love ryan and kate so much!!
Science-reviewed a bit and then watched this slideshow mr medina made from pix he took all year. it was kinda sad but there were so many funny pictures it was hard not to laugh. Plus its earth science so yeah, cant be too sad to begin with. I'm gonna miss shanelle and ashytn soo much!!!!!

ok then the last bell rang and everyone in the school freaked! haha yeah it was really great.

the main reason im writin this is because i wanted to say how much i love st anthonys and everyone there!! ive made so many great friends and everyone is like a big family. the teachers know who everyone goes out with, they give us their email addresses and say to write if they ever need anything, mrs gash even passed around her yearbook for us to sign. my friends are so great and i know we are gonna stay friends a long time. you guys have been there for me when i needed you. 
trish-you were one of my first friends here and one of my best. you understand me so well and know exactly what to say to make me laugh. i can always count on you to stand up for me and help me out and i love you so much
natalee-your the sweetest person ive ever met and you always have somethin nice to say when im down. we got some great laughs together and i can be on the phone with you for hours!
colleen-wow we have tons of insiders!! i dont know anyone i can laugh that hard with on a daily basis. not only do you make me laugh, you know when im down and when to be sensitive and not funny. your so great at listening and i love you so much.
serena-math class would not be the same without you. your a great kid even though you seem to have the lowest self esteem ever!! haha omg engel is gorgeous and i love how you can always say whats on your mind. we got so many laughs and i cant wait to hang out with you this summer. 
shanell-my favorite ES buddy ever. we can always freak out together and rank on mr medina. i love talking to you about our shows and we definitley gotta hang out this summer ! we are gonna see each other next year (psh duh!)
grace-i havent known you for long but everytime i see you i end up crying from laughter. you are so awesome and ppl might think we r crazy but who cares right?? lmao im gonna call you asap to hang out and sneeze and cough on people some more!!
ashtyn and emily-or is it emily and ashtyn...?? haha jk jk. you guys are so cool and i love having D with you guys. i really hope we see each other next year!
brad and ryan-wow...lots of insiders with you two! most of them were about the same thing cough cough. uh you guys kinda already planned on me seeing you so...yeah
danny-another one of my first friends here. i met you on the first day of school and i knew we were gonna be close. we have so much in common and we always make each other crack up. weve had some differences but i dont know what i would do without you. youve gotten me through the whole year and ive helped you through some of your own problems. if you ever need anything i hope you know ill be there and we are gonna stay friends no matter what.


sorry this has been so long. im really excited its summer and i know that im gonna have a great time with ever everyone!! i gotta get back to studying so bye!!

xoxo

ok well besides all that not too much is going on..im a little nervous about my english and global tests because we gotta write essays. and i gotta study a lot of english crap so i should go.  next time i write, it will be SUMMER!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!! im kinda sad because i really love school now and everyone has become so close. i really hope i see everyone next year and even though my teachers hate sophomores ill come bother them :) later lovies!!
